data.text: Should I Buy Pinnacle Arkose 1?

Hi everyone ðŸ‘‹ I want to replace my old road bike with a gravel bike and I am looking for some advice. I came across the Pinnacle Arkose 1 (Evans cycle) which seems to be a very good option - very versatile and not too expensive. If any of you uses it, I'd love to get your feedback! Should I go for that one? I was wondering if the bike had enough gears to take on steep climbs and if it was possible to attach fork bags to it? If you've got any recommendations for other gravel bikes I should look into, please share those too! My budget is Â£800-900 Thanks
The Arkose 1 is well respected for what it is, bare in mind that your budget (and mine) means you are looking towards the bottom-end of the new bike market.
